title: 09/06: Le'Veon Trades, Start or Sit (AFC), Superlatives (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
We're all set to preview some games but Le'Veon Bell is occupying our time with his holdout! We start the show discussing Bell's value and James Conner's value as well as we grade some trades our listeners have made ... Does it make sense to tank Week 1 for Waiver Wire priority? Also Fantasy Superlatives including most likely to enter Round 1 in 2019, most intriguing Week 1 player and more ... Finally our Start or Sit begins! We preview the AFC home games: PIT-CLE, CIN-IND, HOU-NE, SEA-DEN, BUF-BAL, TEN-MIA, KC-LAC, LAR-OAK. Fantasy owners will have to make tough calls on Amari Cooper, LeSean McCoy, Patrick Mahomes, Josh Gordon and more .. Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
